scripts.start-mysql-for-testing: sudo docker run -e MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD=yes -e MYSQL_DATABASE=test --name kv-store-mysql-test -d -p 3307:3306 mysql:5
scripts.end-redis-for-testing: sudo docker kill kv-store-redis-test || true && docker rm kv-store-redis-test || true
scripts.end-mysql-for-testing: sudo docker kill kv-store-mysql-test || true && docker rm kv-store-mysql-test || true
scripts.start-dbs: npm run start-redis-for-testing && npm run start-mysql-for-testing && wait-port -t 30000 6380 && wait-port -t 30000 3307 && sleep 20
scripts.end-dbs: npm run end-redis-for-testing || true && npm run end-mysql-for-testing || true
scripts.test: npm run end-dbs && npm run start-dbs && mocha --exit -r ts-node/register src/**/*.test.ts && npm run end-dbs
scripts.bump:patch: rm -rf build && npm run build && npm version patch && git push origin master
scripts.bump:minor: rm -rf build && npm run build && npm version minor && git push origin master
